**Compare p values.**

Compare the significance and rankings of p values from selected methods.

  - **A:** table including p values of both methods and ranking of genes by p values, for comparison.
  - **B:** select a subset of top-ranked genes by either method.
  - **C:** select the type of plot.
  - **D:** one of these plots: quantile-quantile plot of p values; scatter plot of p value rankings; and Venn diagram of top-gene overlapping.
